availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Ira Munger Major, Jr. (Frankfort, KY, editor, public printer for CofK)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, editor and printer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary B. Scott Major in 1862. Law student in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Editor of The Yeoman newspaper in Frankfort from 1852 to 1886. Public printer for the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1857 to 1860. Editor in Frankfort in 1860. Member of the Democratic party.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 72A.
